subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Klaus Schreiber
author: Lisby
full_text:
On Apr 10, 2008, at 8:28 PM, Jeremy Robert Huber wrote:
>
> >>I read that the man that invented the Luminator had a couple  
> going in
> a room. He sat down to meditate and when he put his head against the
> wall, his head went through the wall like it wasn't there. The
> Luminator must change the energy big time.
>

To say that I am utterly dubious of the truth of this probably  
follows naturally from my last post.

Ann
